fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Deploy a sentry at someone's house.
- Teleport two people, transporting them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The color of this role in the bot is #FF0000.
- Your sentry will kill all visitors to the target.
- Your sentry stays deployed until it attacks a player.
- Your sentry cannot kill Red team members.
